name: proceeds
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the amount of money received from a particular event or activity or when something is sold: The proceeds of today's festival will go to several local charities. It says on the back of the card "all proceeds to charity". Synonyms
take
takings
yield Compare
return noun
profit noun

Add to word list
Add to word list
the amount of money received from a particular sale or event: All proceeds from the auction will be donated to charity.
Add to word list
Add to word list
the amount of money received from an activity, event, or the sale of assets: Most of the proceeds from the sale will be used to pay the retailer's debt. Redemption proceeds of £1,000 or more can be transferred directly to the shareholder's bank account. See also
net proceeds
